Requirement: A weapon with the Heavy trait.

Propping the weapon on your shoulder and widening your stance to prepare for a full-body attack, you are ready to throw your weight around to blow through enemy defenses.

Pros

Block Breaker

  • As an action, you make one attack that has a +3 to hit if the target is grounded.
  • Furthermore, if the target is also using Self-Defense, you ignore the effects of it, gain an additional +3 to hit. On a successful hit, increase the attack's damage die size, and the target's Self-Defense immediately ends.
Armor Breaker
  • As an action, make one attack with advantage to if the target is in Heavy Armor or is a larger creature with Natural Armor.
  • On a successful hit, the creature's Armor Class is reduced by 2 until the start of your next turn.
Weighty
  • When dealing damage by falling on top of another creature, the other creature takes the same amount of falling damage as you.

Cons

Overswing

    If you use either of this stance’s “Breaker” abilities, you cannot switch weapons or from this stance until the beginning of your next turn.
Burdened
  • You do not add your Dexterity Modifier to your AC or Dexterity (Save) checks unless the modifier is negative.
  • If your AC is unchanged by the previous sentence, you have a -2 to AC.
